Package com.shipdream.lib.poke

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Graph.Monitor
    Monitor to watch when the graph is about to inject or release an object
    Provider.OnFreedListener
    Listener will be called when the given provider is not referenced by any objects.
    Provider.OnInjectedListener<T>
    Listener monitoring when the provider is referenced for the first time
    ProviderFinder
    Provider finder is to find the corresponding Provider for the bound class type
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Component
    A component can provide providers by methods annotated by Provides.
    Graph
    Abstract graph manages how to inject dependencies to target objects.
    ImplClassLocator
    Interface to locate implementation class of the given contract class.
    ImplClassLocatorByPattern  
    Provider<T>
    Provider controls the injection type mapping as well as the scope by associated ScopeCache.
    ProviderByClassName<T>
    This provider uses default/empty constructor by provided class name to get dependencies.
    ProviderByClassType<T>
    This provider uses default/empty constructor by provided class type to get dependencies.
    ProviderFinderByRegistry
    ProviderFinder that registers providers manually.
    ScopeCache
    The cache controls how the provider associated should generate new instances.
    ScopeCache.CachedItem<T>  
    SimpleGraph
    Simple graph can register and unregister injection bindings
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ImplClassNotFoundException  
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Provides
    Methods of an object annotated by this annotation indicates the method can provide instance for injecting objects.
